name: NU_CandidaSpeciesExcludingCandidaAurisTestsByCultureAndIdentificationMethodExcludingNAAIdentificationMethod
title: NU_Candida species [Excluding Candida auris] (Tests by Culture and Identification Method [Excluding NAA Identification Method])
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Candida species),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Candida species culture or isolate

LOINC search: ‘’candida auris (culture OR isolate)"),(Exclusion Criteria: Nucleic acid tests and tests for Candida auris)
